divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home from a basketball game we were right by my house and my dad told my friend and I to look up at the sky towards the SE. We all looked up out of the car windows and saw 2 stationary red-orange spheres kind of star-like but bigger. They were just hovering there. Then I go and get out of the car and so does everyone else and they were gone. We waited and looked around for about 5 minutes but they vanished. My friend took a video but then when we went back to look at it the phone said that there was no more memory.
Summary: None moving, two parellel/perpendicular red-orange spheres hovering stationary.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around August 5th 2013
